DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Angiogenic Markers Odense Child Cohort 1
DOC.detailed_description: Overall : The Odense Child Cohort Study ( OCC ) population-based cohort study , comprise pregnant woman recruit January 1st 2010 December 31st 2012 . All woman pregnant municipality Odense time eligible participation , 6,707 woman approach directly recruitment material . The study comply Helsinki declaration approve Regional Scientific Ethical Committee Southern Denmark , . S-20090130 . All participant give inform consent . From population base 6,707 pregnant woman , 2,874 ( 42.9 % ) enrol OCC December 31st , 2012 . The child follow 18 year age . Serum sample take early pregnancy ( GA 2-25 week ) , late pregnancy ( GA 26-30 week ) , maternal serum cord blood birth , child along general examination age 3 month , 1 year , 3 year . Questionnaires complete family early pregnancy , late pregnancy , birth , time clinical examination child . Register data health variable available Danish registry . Objective : The Vitamin D Angiogenic Marker Study 1 examines relationship serum biomarkers 25 ( OH ) D soluble Fms-like kinase 1 ( sFlt-1 ) placental growth factor ( PlGF ) pregnancy risk miscarriage adverse outcome early pregnancy . Method : - 25 ( OH ) D analysis : Serum store -80º Celsius analysis , perform liquid chromatography mass spectrometry ( LC-MS/MS ) . Triple deuterium mark 25 ( OH ) vitamin D3 add serum sample internal standard deproteinized ZnSO4 methanol , centrifuge 2750 g 10 minute , 100 μl inject TurboFlow column ( Thermo Scientific ) LC-MS/MS . The LC-MS/MS consist Thermo Scientific TLX1 system connect Thermo Scientific Vantage TSQ . 25 ( OH ) D2 25 ( OH ) D3 concentrate Thermo Scientific Cyclone P 50 x 1.0 mm column back-flushed analytical column , Phenomenex Gemini C18 50 x 3.0 mm elute analytical column gradient . Mobile phase A : 10 mM NH4Ac water B : 10 mM NH4Ac methanol . Human serum spike appropriate amount 25 ( OH ) D2 25 ( OH ) D3 order produce six point calibration curve ( weigh 1/x2 ) 3 level QC sample ( low , mid , high ) . The method calibrate NIST standard 972.25 The C3 epimer D3 detect along D3 two distinguishable one another . Lowest detectable concentration 0.15 nM D2 D3 . Values D2 D3 consider 6.5 nM . - Measurements BRAHMS sFlt-1 PIGF KRYPTOR assay perform fully automate KRYPTOR compact Plus system ( KRYPTOR PlGF KRYPTOR sFlt-1 ; Thermo Fisher Scientific ) accord manufacturer 's instruction . The BRAHMS sFlt-1 PlGF KRYPTOR assay homogeneous sandwich immunoassay base Trace technology24 . The total duration assay 9 minute ( sFlt-1 ) 29 minute ( PlGF ) sample volume 9 µl , 70 μl , respectively . The assay calibrate recombinant human sFlt-1 PIGF standardize Quantikine PIGF ELISA ( R & D Systems Europe Ltd , Abingdon , UK ) sFlt-1 Elecsys assay ( Elecsys , Penzberg , Germany ) . According manufacturer 's instruction use , KRYPTOR sFlt-1 assay cover measuring range 22-90,000 pg/ml . The limit detection 22 pg/ml limit quantization ( functional sensitivity ) 29 pg/ml . The intra- inter-assay variation sFlt-1 concentration 1540 pg/ml 0.3 % 0.8 % , respectively ; 2988 pg/ml 0.5 % 1.1 % ; 9666 pg/ml 0.5 % 1.0 % , respectively . The KRYPTOR PlGF assay cover measure range 3.6-7.000 pg/ml . The limit detection 3.6 pg/ml limit quantitation 6.9 pg/ml . The intra- inter-assay variation PlGF concentration 35 pg/ml 4.6 % 7.3 % , respectively ; 103 pg/ml 2.1 % 3.1 % , 430 pg/ml 0.9 % 2.3 % , respectively . - Measurements Elecsys sFlt-1 PIGF assay perform fully automate Elecsys system ( Elecsys , Penzberg , Germany ) accord manufacturer 's instruction . The Elecsys assay sandwich immunoassay base electrochemiluminescence technology . The total duration assay 18 minute sample volume 20 µl sFlt-1 50 µl PIGF . The assay calibrate recombinant human PIGF sFlt-1 standardize Quantikine PIGF vascular endothelial growth factor-R1 ELISAs ( R & D Systems , Minneapolis , MN ) . According manufacturer 's instruction use , Elecsys sFlt-1 assay cover measure range 10-85,000 pg/ml , Elecsys PIGF assay 3-10,000 pg/ml . The limit detection 10 pg/ml ( sFlt-1 ) 3 pg/ml ( PIGF ) . The limit quantization 15 pg/ml sFlt-1 10 pg/ml PIGF . The Vitamin D Angiogenic Marker Study 1 : Vitamin D angiogenic marker early pregnancy .
